title: How to get keys out of a locked car with automatic locks - Quora

response.answer_text: How do I get keys out of a locked car with automatic locks? Verify that all the doors are actually locked, and not just the one you’re trying.Use your second key, or the spare copy you made when you first got the car.Use the spare fob.Get a wire (like a coat hanger) and wedge a door open slightly so you can work the wire past the door seals and manipulate the electric unlock switch, the mechanical unlock button, or the door handle.
